## Runtime.Context.SimpleContextQualifierProvider class

Simple concrete implementation of [IContextQualifierProvider](./ts-res.runtime.context.icontextqualifierprovider.md) using a `ResultMap` for qualifier value storage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SimpleContextQualifierProvider extends ContextQualifierProvider implements IMutableContextQualifierProvider 
```
**Extends:** ContextQualifierProvider

**Implements:** IMutableContextQualifierProvider
